body_html:
It's common to access an external variable inside a while_loop. For
example, RNN code does this all the time via tf.get_variable(). How are
you creating a variable? Directly with tf.Variable?

On Tue, Oct 4, 2016 at 5:11 AM, Linara Adilova notifications@github.com
wrote:

@Fr-d-rik https://github.com/Fr-d-rik hi!
The way that I was able to found - remove Variable initialization from the
scan step. I do not know is this a case for you, but I had something like

var = tf.Variable(...)

inside the step. Once I removed it outside the step, by announcing earlier
and just accessing inside, error disappeared.
Hope it can help you

—
